Description: Fragment of flattened handle probably at neck join from a pottery transport amphora. Clay medium-fine red-brown with dark inclusions and a little mica. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: A puzzling piece. If it comes from the neck join the handle slopes down from the join; if from the shoulder it bulges out a little above the join. The name is found sporadically around the Aegean.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Charles Thomas Newton (perhaps)
